Hack your own software projects using cloud host providers

Safe - Isolated - Easy - Useful

Github Project

Hack your self safely

  • idsFree is a new way to hack your own application in a isolated and controlled environment.
  • Perform hacking tasks in any cloud provider, like: Amazon AWS, Google Compute Engine, Digital Ocean, ...
  • Build a secure, isolated and safely environment where pentesters can launch any kind of attacks without affect other tenants or cloud providers clients.
